note.p: Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1950-1951 vol 7 pp 35-61, plate, by Cecil A Hoare and Doris L Mackinnon
References: A R Hall, 'The Leeuwenhoek Lecture, 1988. Antoni van Leeuwenhoek 1632-1723' in NR 1989 vol 43 pp 249-273
Brian J Ford, 'The Leeuwenhoekiana of Clifford Dobell (1886-1949)' in NR 1986-87 vol 41 pp 95-105, plate
H Gest, 'The Discovery of Microorganisms by Robert Hooke and Antoni von Leeuwenhoek, Fellows of the Royal Society' in NR 2004 vol 58 pp 187-201
